name: Holiday Rice Pudding
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: This is not your standard rice pudding - studded with fruits and subtly spiced, it is a great alternative to pies or cakes.
ingredients: 1 cup UNCLE BEN'S® ORIGINAL CONVERTED® Brand Rice
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon or cardamom for dusting
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Steep the tea bags until tea is strong, about 5 minutes
Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in the rice; cook and stir until grains are coated and begin to turn golden, about 2 minutes
Raise heat to medium-high and bring to a boil; reduce heat, cover, and cook on low until most of liquid is absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Stir in milk, sugar, rum, raisins, cranberries, and pineapple
Cover; return to stove and cook over low heat until mixture is thickened and silky, 35 to 45 minutes
Spoon into serving dishes and dust with cinnamon or cardamom
